oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Investment in agricultural research: Some economic principles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Scobie, G.M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Methods
Economics
Research
Investment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study aims at providing managers of agricultural research programs in developing countries with some guidelines for research resource allocation. Although various formal models are reviewed, the approach is a pragmatic one, aimed at producing a "practitioners guide" to research planning.
